entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is a house-elf who works for the Black family. He is described as being respectful towards Narcissa Black and is said to have left the house after Sirius shouted at him.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a member of the Order of the Phoenix and is mentioned as being trapped in the Department of Mysteries. Harry gave Professor Snape a warning about this vision.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a wise and knowledgeable character who knows about Kreacher's actions and has spoken to him.

entities.name: narcissa black
entities.description: Narcissa Black is the cousin of Sirius and the sister of Bellatrix. She is mentioned as being a member of the Black family.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: Bellatrix is the sister of Narcissa and the wife of Lucius Malfoy.

entities.name: lucius malfoy
entities.description: Lucius Malfoy is the husband of Bellatrix.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a member of the Order of the Phoenix and has given Professor Snape a warning about his vision.

entities.name: professor snape
entities.description: Professor Snape is a member of the Order of the Phoenix who received a warning from Harry about Sirius being trapped in the Department of Mysteries.

entities.name: department of mysteries
entities.description: The Department of Mysteries is a location where Sirius is trapped according to Harry's vision.

entities.name: order of the phoenix
entities.description: The Order of the Phoenix is an organization that has members like Sirius and Professor Snape.

relationships.description: Kreacher left the house after Sirius shouted at him.
Dumbledore spoke to Kreacher about his actions.
Harry gave Professor Snape a warning about Sirius being trapped in the Department of Mysteries.
Dumbledore informed Kreacher that he knew about his actions.
Professor Snape attempted to contact Sirius after receiving a warning from Harry.
